entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 1.

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Rain or periods of freezing rain early in the morning. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
